name: Residential Address Detection
author: Eniture Technology

sections.description:
An add-on plugin developed by Eniture Technology. The plugin works with Eniture Technology’s Small Package Quotes and LTL Freight Quotes plugins. It identifies the address type of the ship-to address provided by website visitors. When the address type is residential, the residential delivery fee is included in the shipping rate estimate returned by the carrier.

Key Features

  • When enabled, automatically identifies residential and commercial addresses.

Requirements

  • WooCommerce 6.4 or newer.
  • The installation of at least one of Eniture Technology’s Small Package Quotes or LTL Freight Quotes plugins.
sections.changelog:
2.5.4

  • Fix: Corrected the order of the plugin tabs.

2.5.3

  • Update: Restricted merchants from changing plans from the staging site.

2.5.2

  • Update: Compatibility with Priority 1 plugin

2.5.1

  • Update: Compatibility with WordPress version 6.5.1
  • Update: Compatibility with PHP version 8.2.0

2.5.0

  • Update: Added feature “Do not return rates if the ship to address appears to be a post office box”

2.4.3

  • Update: Compatibility with WooCommerce HPOS(High-Performance Order Storage)

2.4.2

  • Update: Compatibility with FreightQuote version 2.2.8

2.4.1

  • Update: Updated end point URL from sub folder to sub domain

2.4.0

  • Fix: Allow space character in the city name

2.3.0

  • Update: Added feature “Address Type Disclosure”

2.2.6

  • Update: Compatibility with WordPress version 6.1
  • Update: Compatibility with WooCommerce version 7.0.1

2.2.5

  • Update: Added compatibility with plugin TQL.
  • Fix: Fixes in compatibility with plugin DAY&ROSS.

2.2.4

  • Update: Compatibility with PHP version 8.1.
  • Update: Compatibility with WordPress version 5.9.

2.2.3

  • Compatibility with GlobalTranz.

2.2.2

  • Update: Compatibility with PHP version 8.0
  • Update: Compatibility with WordPress version 5.8

2.2.1

  • Update: Added compatibility with plugin DAY&ROSS.

2.1.1

  • Compatibility with Freigtview v2 plugin

2.1.0

  • Update: Compatibility with WooCommerce 5.6

2.0.1

  • Update: Compatibility with WooCommerce 5.5.

2.0.0

  • Update: For only small package plugins
    a) Overrides the Auto-detect residential addresses functionality with the user-defined value.
    b) Default value of unconfirmed addresses.
    c) RAD in a separate tab

1.1.2

  • Update: Compatibility with WooCommerce 5.4.

1.1.1

  • Fix: UI Fixed on setting page.

1.1.0

  • Update: Introduced an option to control default address is commercial or residential.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Real-time identification of residential and commercial address types.
